statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); project_name=$(basename "$current_dir"); git_branch=$(git -C "$current_dir" rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo "no-git"); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); printf "%s [%s] | %s" "$project_name" "$git_branch" "$model"
